A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie focuses so much on subverting expectations that it loses focus of what makes a story exciting and well written. I also have to say that I love Rian Johnson’s other films\, but those are mostly stand alone films. I feel he focused more on fitting everything into this movie that he could rather than the franchises story as a whole. It seems he didn’t realize that over a series of movies this long\, there needs to be slow builds\, with payoffs that feel rewarding and not rushed. I don’t feel he’s provided any set up or anticipation for episode 9\, and definitely didn’t build on those set up in episode 7.
